title: Make urf a permanent gamemode.
body: It will shut all of the "BRING URF BACK" up and it will create a huge amount of fun.

replies.body:
i would like to see URF permanently removed, just to see people suffer.

Dear community, we've decided to permanently remove URF because we hate the retarded little children playing it. Please fuckoff and go back to living your sh*ty little life which is fueled by MLP and Dora the Explorer.

I remember how fun U.R.F was when they first brought it out and everyone was picking fun champs and doing troll builds... Now it's just a cluster fuck of God tier champs and people play to win games before 15 mins zzz so boring now xd.
narr im already bored of it
well aren't you a fun guy^
